she wanted to be dissociated with the
brand
first it came after she saw a film

very high animal ethic standards animal
production standards it doesn't matter
whether it's in relation to crocodiles
or cattle or whatever else the whole
industry is heavily regulated and there
is an argument that farming has actually
protected crocodiles by discouraging
